Title: Object: Le repos
Series: Galerie du Palais Royal
Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt, after Annibale Carracci: landscape with in the right foreground the Virgin sitting on a river bank with Christ Child sleeping on her lap, two kneeling angels adoring Christ, and two others hovering above and scattering flowers; on the right, Joseph leading the ass. c.1786 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Robert de Launay
Curator's comments: From 'Galerie du Palais Royal', a set published between 1786 and 1808; see 1837,0408.317 for comment. A composition similar to the Hermitage tondo by Annibale Carracci; see Posner 142.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (82)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
